author: amaltaro
body:
Work in progress!

It should fail with an error message like:
```
pip._internal.exceptions.InstallationError: Command errored out with exit status 1: python setup.py egg_info Check the logs for full command output.
```

which as far as google brings me, it's related to the setuptools version that we have in Py3 COMP `39.2.0`.

@smuzaffar any chance you have already seen this error? I will try upgrading setuptools next.
title: Build Py3 dbs3-client from PyPi
